gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 121, Thunder 111
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the Thunder, 121-111. Myles Turner led the way for the Pacers with 24 points (11-17 FG), four assists and four blocks, while Tyrese Haliburton added 18 points, four rebounds and 12 assists in the victory. Shai Gilgeous-Alexander tallied 30 points, 10 rebounds and five assists for the Thunder in the losing effort. The Pacers have won back-to-back games as they improve to 37-29 on the season, while the Thunder fall to 45-20.
